short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UI Updates by bcwfs to Crypto-Games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-- Features --

1) Converts coin amounts to the currency of your choice in the live logs as they stream in.  Will NOT convert previous logs upon switch as of yet.
2) Prompts you before you send a 1 word message in chat (no more mutes :))
